meanings.sent1: That fuckwit always makes silly mistakes.
meanings.sent2: Don't listen to that fuckwit, they don't know what they're talking about.
meanings.sent3: The class clown was known for being the biggest fuckwit in school.
meanings.sent4: His reckless driving earned him the title of the neighborhood fuckwit.
meanings.sent5: She couldn't help but shake her head at the antics of the village fuckwit.

meanings.definition: To behave in a foolish or stupid manner.
meanings.sent1: Stop fuckwitting around and focus on your work.
meanings.sent2: I can't believe he continues to fuckwit despite the consequences.
meanings.sent3: He always manages to fuckwit his way out of trouble.
meanings.sent4: Her attempts to fix the computer only seemed to fuckwit it further.
meanings.sent5: The toddler began to fuckwit with the buttons on the remote control.
